Issue.creator: gudkov
Issue.summary: iOS Wrapper: Fix State Proof related regressions in iOS wrapper tests
Issue.description: The latest changes related to StateProofs most probably caused a regression in .Net wrapper tests. Genesis txns data must be changed and also some assumptions in tests are wrong now. We need to handle this. Corresponded fixes to java and python wrapper you can find here: https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-sdk/pull/285
